Greetings.

Quote

 

we are awaiting a list containing the landing cost of the stock. As per this provided list, they have only provided the “WAC”. Please confirm if the “WAC” is the initial cost paid by the client for the goods before sale so it may be considered as a landing cost?

 

As per the email, we are also awaiting 3x quotations for all damages. As I can see, there is only one quotation for each area of damage. Please request the additional quotations for us to review.

 

We also note that there is quotations and shoes damaged for a “warehouse” which we are unaware of at the moment. Could you confirm if this is being submitted under this claim or they are separate, as I have not inspected any warehouse so far, only the Dubai Mall location.

 

Additionally, we will need to re-inspect the shoes that have been damaged now that we have received the full list.

 

Once we have received this, we can proceed further.

 

Unquote

 

Please review and update us.

 

Thanking you.

 

Best Regards,

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings.

 

Please find the loss adjuster finding and update us on the below.

 

Quote

 

we are awaiting a list containing the landing cost of the stock. As per this provided list, they have only provided the “WAC”. Please confirm if the “WAC” is the initial cost paid by the client for the goods before sale so it may be considered as a landing cost?

 

As per the email, we are also awaiting 3x quotations for all damages. As I can see, there is only one quotation for each area of damage. Please request the additional quotations for us to review.

 

We also note that there is quotations and shoes damaged for a “warehouse” which we are unaware of at the moment. Could you confirm if this is being submitted under this claim or they are separate, as I have not inspected any warehouse so far, only the Dubai Mall location.

 

Additionally, we will need to re-inspect the shoes that have been damaged now that we have received the full list.

 

Once we have received this, we can proceed further.

 

Unquote

 

Please review and update us.

 

Thanking you.

 

Best Regards,

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings.

 

Please find the loss adjuster finding and update us on the below.

 

Quote

 

we are awaiting a list containing the landing cost of the stock. As per this provided list, they have only provided the “WAC”. Please confirm if the “WAC” is the initial cost paid by the client for the goods before sale so it may be considered as a landing cost?

 

As per the email, we are also awaiting 3x quotations for all damages. As I can see, there is only one quotation for each area of damage. Please request the additional quotations for us to review.

 

We also note that there is quotations and shoes damaged for a “warehouse” which we are unaware of at the moment. Could you confirm if this is being submitted under this claim or they are separate, as I have not inspected any warehouse so far, only the Dubai Mall location.

 

Additionally, we will need to re-inspect the shoes that have been damaged now that we have received the full list.

 

Once we have received this, we can proceed further.

 

Unquote

 

Please review and update us.

 

Thanking you.

 

Best Regards,

Subject: RE: Insured: Allied Enterprises LLC (Chalhoub) - Insurer: GIG / Level Shoes Dubai Mall - Water leakage - DOL 15/04/2024 - Nasco claim# 66-FIR-2024-04-000145

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings.

 

Please find the loss adjuster finding and update us on the below.

 

Quote

 

we are awaiting a list containing the landing cost of the stock. As per this provided list, they have only provided the “WAC”. Please confirm if the “WAC” is the initial cost paid by the client for the goods before sale so it may be considered as a landing cost?

 

As per the email, we are also awaiting 3x quotations for all damages. As I can see, there is only one quotation for each area of damage. Please request the additional quotations for us to review.

 

We also note that there is quotations and shoes damaged for a “warehouse” which we are unaware of at the moment. Could you confirm if this is being submitted under this claim or they are separate, as I have not inspected any warehouse so far, only the Dubai Mall location.

 

Additionally, we will need to re-inspect the shoes that have been damaged now that we have received the full list.

 

Once we have received this, we can proceed further.

 

Unquote

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings.

 

Please find the loss adjuster finding and update us on the below.

 

Quote

 

we are awaiting a list containing the landing cost of the stock. As per this provided list, they have only provided the “WAC”. Please confirm if the “WAC” is the initial cost paid by the client for the goods before sale so it may be considered as a landing cost?

 

As per the email, we are also awaiting 3x quotations for all damages. As I can see, there is only one quotation for each area of damage. Please request the additional quotations for us to review.

 

We also note that there is quotations and shoes damaged for a “warehouse” which we are unaware of at the moment. Could you confirm if this is being submitted under this claim or they are separate, as I have not inspected any warehouse so far, only the Dubai Mall location.

 

Additionally, we will need to re-inspect the shoes that have been damaged now that we have received the full list.

 

Once we have received this, we can proceed further.

 

Unquote

 

Please review and update us.

 

Thanking you.

 

Best Regards,

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings.

 

Please find the loss adjuster finding and update us on the below.

 

Quote

 

we are awaiting a list containing the landing cost of the stock. As per this provided list, they have only provided the “WAC”. Please confirm if the “WAC” is the initial cost paid by the client for the goods before sale so it may be considered as a landing cost?

 

As per the email, we are also awaiting 3x quotations for all damages. As I can see, there is only one quotation for each area of damage. Please request the additional quotations for us to review.

 

We also note that there is quotations and shoes damaged for a “warehouse” which we are unaware of at the moment. Could you confirm if this is being submitted under this claim or they are separate, as I have not inspected any warehouse so far, only the Dubai Mall location.

 

Additionally, we will need to re-inspect the shoes that have been damaged now that we have received the full list.

 

Once we have received this, we can proceed further.

 

Unquote

 

Please review and update us.

 

Thanking you.

 

Best Regards,

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings.

 

Please find the loss adjuster finding and update us on the below.

 

Quote

 

we are awaiting a list containing the landing cost of the stock. As per this provided list, they have only provided the “WAC”. Please confirm if the “WAC” is the initial cost paid by the client for the goods before sale so it may be considered as a landing cost?

 

As per the email, we are also awaiting 3x quotations for all damages. As I can see, there is only one quotation for each area of damage. Please request the additional quotations for us to review.

 

We also note that there is quotations and shoes damaged for a “warehouse” which we are unaware of at the moment. Could you confirm if this is being submitted under this claim or they are separate, as I have not inspected any warehouse so far, only the Dubai Mall location.

 

Additionally, we will need to re-inspect the shoes that have been damaged now that we have received the full list.

 

Once we have received this, we can proceed further.

 

Unquote

 

Please review and update us.

 

Thanking you.

 

Best Regards,

Subject: RE: Insured: Allied Enterprises LLC (Chalhoub) - Insurer: GIG / Level Shoes Dubai Mall - Water leakage - DOL 15/04/2024 - Nasco claim# 66-FIR-2024-04-000145

Dear Hagop,

 

Greetings.

 

Please find the loss adjuster finding and update us on the below.

 

Quote

 

we are awaiting a list containing the landing cost of the stock. As per this provided list, they have only provided the “WAC”. Please confirm if the “WAC” is the initial cost paid by the client for the goods before sale so it may be considered as a landing cost?

 

As per the email, we are also awaiting 3x quotations for all damages. As I can see, there is only one quotation for each area of damage. Please request the additional quotations for us to review.

 

We also note that there is quotations and shoes damaged for a “warehouse” which we are unaware of at the moment. Could you confirm if this is being submitted under this claim or they are separate, as I have not inspected any warehouse so far, only the Dubai Mall location.

 

Additionally, we will need to re-inspect the shoes that have been damaged now that we have received the full list.

 

Once we have received this, we can proceed further.

 

Unquote

 

Please review and update us.

 

Thanking you.

 

Best Regards,
